item.title: Endless Runner
item.description: Implemented of jumping mechanic. Implemented of path generation based on sliding window problem. Implemented of object pooling to stop memory wastage.

item.title: Shooting Platformer
item.description: Implemented mario style jumping mechanic. Implemented weapon aiming using animation rigging. Implemented various types of bullets. Implemented enemy AI

item.title: Space Shooter
item.description: Implemented spacecraft movement. Implemented various types of powerups. Implemented object pooling to stop memory wastage. Implemented enemy generation.
